title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crisp, add garlic if using.
Beat eggs with Parmesan and black pepper.
Drain pasta and toss with pancetta.
Remove from heat, quickly stir in egg mixture.
Serve hot with extra cheese.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until golden.
Saut√© onion and garlic until soft.
Add tomato puree and simmer 5 mins.
Stir in cream and grilled chicken.
Simmer for another 10 mins and serve.

title: Bitterleaf Soup
summary: Traditional Nigerian soup with assorted meats, cocoyam thickener, and bitterleaf.
instructions: Boil meats and stockfish with seasoning until tender.
Add palm oil and allow to simmer.
Stir in cocoyam puree to thicken.
Add bitterleaf and stir well.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve.

title: Nsala Soup
summary: Nigerian white soup made with yam puree, meats, and utazi leaves.
ingredients: Yam puree (pounded yam or boiled & blended yam)
instructions: Boil meat and stockfish with seasoning until soft.
Add yam puree to thicken soup.
Add catfish and cook gently.
Add utazi leaves and adjust seasoning.
Simmer for 5 mins and serve hot.
